item.title: AWS: Spinning up a Neo4j instance with APOC installed
item.description: One of the first things I do after installing Neo4j is install the APOC library, but I find it's a bit of a manual process when spinning up a server on AWS so I wanted to simplify it a bit. There's already a Neo4j AMI which installs Neo4j 3.2.0 and my colleague Michael pointed out that we could download APOC into the correct folder by writing a script and sending it as UserData.
